TopicTitle: What should be worked on after .24?

Articles.Content: Oddly enough, I'm quite happy with the game and have no issues other than ubio welding not working right... I run about 2 dozen mods but I can't really complain about anything at this point. If they implement some of the mods into stock game then fine, if not, they work anyways so I'm happy either way However, parts taking damage and needing repairs could be cool, instead of just blowing up.
